content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":5161,"originalJapaneseLine":"　外殻がそれっぽく形取ってる……へええ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"The outer shell is shaped quite realistically... wow...!"},{"lineNumber":5162,"originalJapaneseLine":"　基本的には魔力みたいだけど、造形は凝ってるや」","translatedEnglishLine":"Basically it seems to be magical energy, but the design is elaborate."},{"lineNumber":5163,"originalJapaneseLine":"「オ……オイ。触レルナ」","translatedEnglishLine":"O... oi. Don't touch it."},{"lineNumber":5164,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう、分かるか。","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh? You can tell?"},{"lineNumber":5165,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふふん。それはサテラが十年以上掛けてな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Heh heh. That took Satela over ten years to create..."},{"lineNumber":5166,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まるで筋肉みたいに粘土の層が……","translatedEnglishLine":"The layers of clay look just like muscle..."},{"lineNumber":5167,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あっ、あっ、すごい……もっと見せてくれないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, ah, amazing... could you show me more?"},{"lineNumber":5168,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がーーーーーー！　ちびすけ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Gyaaaaa! You little brat!"},{"lineNumber":5169,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前、質問禁止！」","translatedEnglishLine":"You're forbidden from asking questions!"},{"lineNumber":5170,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……ごめんごめん。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... sorry, sorry."},{"lineNumber":5171,"originalJapaneseLine":"　……でも、興味深い人ばっかりですごいよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"...But it's amazing how everyone is so interesting."},{"lineNumber":5172,"originalJapaneseLine":"「タチを悪くしたマリアみたいだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"She's like Maria, but worse..."},{"lineNumber":5173,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス！　合図、あったわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance! We got the signal!"},{"lineNumber":5174,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よっしゃ出撃！　いくぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let's sortie! Here we go!"},{"lineNumber":5175,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの号令に従い、魔人討伐隊は出撃していく。","translatedEnglishLine":"Following Rance's command, the demon extermination squad set out."},{"lineNumber":5176,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ようし、私も頑張ろう。いくぞーー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, I'll do my best too. Let's go—"},{"lineNumber":5177,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ッ、どけこの雑魚が！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Tch, get out of the way, you weakling!"},{"lineNumber":5178,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃーーーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gyaaaaaaa!"},{"lineNumber":5179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わっと！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoa!"},{"lineNumber":5180,"originalJapaneseLine":"目の前で、魔物兵が倒れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"In front of me, a monster soldier falls."},{"lineNumber":5181,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":".........................."},

{"lineNumber":5182,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔物スーツ……どうなってるんだろこれ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Monster suit... I wonder how this works."},

{"lineNumber":5183,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私も着られないかな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder if I could wear it too..."},

{"lineNumber":5184,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう帰れお前！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Go home already, you!"},

{"lineNumber":5185,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっ！？　なんじゃこりゃ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gwah!? What the hell is this!"},

{"lineNumber":5186,"originalJapaneseLine":"ある日。","translatedEnglishLine":"One day."},

{"lineNumber":5187,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城の廊下一杯に、","translatedEnglishLine":"The hallway of Rance Castle was filled with"},

{"lineNumber":5188,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネジやゼンマイの山が積み上がっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"piles of screws and springs stacked up."},

{"lineNumber":5189,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わ、わあああぁぁ……すごいですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"W-whoa... this is amazing..."},

{"lineNumber":5190,"originalJapaneseLine":"「歩きにくいどころか、進むのが不可能だぞ……","translatedEnglishLine":"It's not just hard to walk, moving forward is impossible..."},

{"lineNumber":5191,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ええい、邪魔だ、くそ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, you're in the way, damn it!"},

{"lineNumber":5192,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、人類王」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, Human King."},

{"lineNumber":5193,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬっ、ポピンズのメスガキ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nuh, Pappin's brat girl."},

{"lineNumber":5194,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだこれは。お前の仕業か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What is this? Is this your doing?"},

{"lineNumber":5195,"originalJapaneseLine":"「違いまちゅ！　東芝様でち！」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it's not! It's Lord Toshiba!"},

{"lineNumber":5196,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……東芝？　何やってんだあいつ」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Toshiba? What is he doing?"},

{"lineNumber":5197,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わたくちと愛の語らいをしている最中に、","translatedEnglishLine":"While I was having a loving talk with him,"},

{"lineNumber":5198,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こう、急に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"he suddenly just did this..."},

{"lineNumber":5199,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……どうせ、メカ話でもしてたんだろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Probably was talking about machines or something."},

{"lineNumber":5200,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ……余計な一言で","translatedEnglishLine":"Guh... with that unnecessary comment,"},

{"lineNumber":5201,"originalJapaneseLine":"　甘い記憶を汚さないで欲しいのでち！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to keep that sweet memory unspoiled!"},

{"lineNumber":5202,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええと、それで急に……","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, so suddenly..."},

{"lineNumber":5203,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうしたんですか、このネジ山……」","translatedEnglishLine":"what happened with these piles of screws...?"},

{"lineNumber":5204,"originalJapaneseLine":"「語らいの中心だった器兵を、","translatedEnglishLine":"He started to disassemble the mecha soldier that was the center of the talk,"},

{"lineNumber":5205,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その場でバラし始めたのでち」","translatedEnglishLine":"right there on the spot."},

{"lineNumber":5206,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……その場で。","translatedEnglishLine":"...On the spot."},

{"lineNumber":5207,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それでこれ、なんですか……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"And so this is what happened...?"},

{"lineNumber":5208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでこれ、なのでち」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, this is the result."},

{"lineNumber":5209,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……はた迷惑な生き物だな、","translatedEnglishLine":"...Pappins really are bothersome creatures,"},

{"lineNumber":5210,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ポピンズってのは」","translatedEnglishLine":"those Pappins."},

{"lineNumber":5211,"originalJapaneseLine":"「東芝様が特殊なだけでち！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Toshiba is just a special case!"},

{"lineNumber":5212,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とは言っても、","translatedEnglishLine":"That said,"},

{"lineNumber":5213,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょっと弄るとかそういうレベルじゃないぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"this isn't just a little tinkering, you know."},

{"lineNumber":5214,"originalJapaneseLine":"道いっぱいに広がっている器兵の残骸は、","translatedEnglishLine":"The remains of the mecha soldiers scattered across the road"},

{"lineNumber":5215,"originalJapaneseLine":"細部に至るまでバラされており、","translatedEnglishLine":"were dismantled down to the smallest details,"},

{"lineNumber":5216,"originalJapaneseLine":"原形を留めてはいなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"with no original form remaining."},

{"lineNumber":5217,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………みつけた、これか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Found it, is this the one?"},

{"lineNumber":5218,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あったあった、このネジだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Here it is, this screw."},

{"lineNumber":5219,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここ、大きめのひとつを使ったんだけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"I used a larger one here, but"},

{"lineNumber":5220,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やっぱり小さいふたつを噛み合わせた方が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"maybe it’s better to mesh two smaller ones together..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外殻がそれっぽく形取ってる……へええ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The outer shell is shaped quite realistically... wow...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 基本的には魔力みたいだけど、造形は凝ってるや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basically it seems to be magical energy, but the design is elaborate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オ……オイ。触レルナ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: O... oi. Don't touch it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、分かるか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh? You can tell?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふふん。それはサテラが十年以上掛けてな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh. That took Satela over ten years to create...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まるで筋肉みたいに粘土の層が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The layers of clay look just like muscle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、あっ、すごい……もっと見せてくれないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, ah, amazing... could you show me more?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーーーーーー！　ちびすけ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gyaaaaa! You little brat!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前、質問禁止！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're forbidden from asking questions!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ……ごめんごめん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... sorry, sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……でも、興味深い人ばっかりですごいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...But it's amazing how everyone is so interesting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「タチを悪くしたマリアみたいだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's like Maria, but worse...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス！　合図、あったわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance! We got the signal!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よっしゃ出撃！　いくぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's sortie! Here we go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの号令に従い、魔人討伐隊は出撃していく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Following Rance's command, the demon extermination squad set out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ようし、私も頑張ろう。いくぞーー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I'll do my best too. Let's go—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、どけこの雑魚が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, get out of the way, you weakling!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃーーーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gyaaaaaaa!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わっと！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目の前で、魔物兵が倒れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of me, a monster soldier falls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物スーツ……どうなってるんだろこれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster suit... I wonder how this works.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も着られないかな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder if I could wear it too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう帰れお前！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Go home already, you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐわっ！？　なんじゃこりゃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gwah!? What the hell is this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある日。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の廊下一杯に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hallway of Rance Castle was filled with

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネジやゼンマイの山が積み上がっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: piles of screws and springs stacked up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、わあああぁぁ……すごいですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-whoa... this is amazing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「歩きにくいどころか、進むのが不可能だぞ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not just hard to walk, moving forward is impossible...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええい、邪魔だ、くそ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, you're in the way, damn it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、人類王」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Human King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬっ、ポピンズのメスガキ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nuh, Pappin's brat girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだこれは。お前の仕業か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is this? Is this your doing?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「違いまちゅ！　東芝様でち！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it's not! It's Lord Toshiba!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……東芝？　何やってんだあいつ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Toshiba? What is he doing?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わたくちと愛の語らいをしている最中に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While I was having a loving talk with him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こう、急に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he suddenly just did this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……どうせ、メカ話でもしてたんだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Probably was talking about machines or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……余計な一言で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guh... with that unnecessary comment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 甘い記憶を汚さないで欲しいのでち！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to keep that sweet memory unspoiled!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええと、それで急に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, so suddenly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしたんですか、このネジ山……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what happened with these piles of screws...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「語らいの中心だった器兵を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He started to disassemble the mecha soldier that was the center of the talk,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場でバラし始めたのでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: right there on the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……その場で。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...On the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでこれ、なんですか……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so this is what happened...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでこれ、なのでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, this is the result.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……はた迷惑な生き物だな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Pappins really are bothersome creatures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポピンズってのは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: those Pappins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「東芝様が特殊なだけでち！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Toshiba is just a special case!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とは言っても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That said,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと弄るとかそういうレベルじゃないぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this isn't just a little tinkering, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道いっぱいに広がっている器兵の残骸は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The remains of the mecha soldiers scattered across the road

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 細部に至るまでバラされており、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were dismantled down to the smallest details,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 原形を留めてはいなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with no original form remaining.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………みつけた、これか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Found it, is this the one?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あったあった、このネジだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here it is, this screw.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ、大きめのひとつを使ったんだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I used a larger one here, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱり小さいふたつを噛み合わせた方が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: maybe it’s better to mesh two smaller ones together...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

{"lineNumber":5216,"originalJapaneseLine":"原形を留めてはいなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"with no original form remaining."},

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外殻がそれっぽく形取ってる……へええ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The outer shell is shaped quite realistically... wow...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 基本的には魔力みたいだけど、造形は凝ってるや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basically it seems to be magical energy, but the design is elaborate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オ……オイ。触レルナ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: O... oi. Don't touch it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、分かるか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh? You can tell?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふふん。それはサテラが十年以上掛けてな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh. That took Satela over ten years to create...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まるで筋肉みたいに粘土の層が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The layers of clay look just like muscle...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、あっ、すごい……もっと見せてくれないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, ah, amazing... could you show me more?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーーーーーー！　ちびすけ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gyaaaaa! You little brat!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前、質問禁止！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're forbidden from asking questions!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ……ごめんごめん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... sorry, sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……でも、興味深い人ばっかりですごいよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...But it's amazing how everyone is so interesting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「タチを悪くしたマリアみたいだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's like Maria, but worse...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス！　合図、あったわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance! We got the signal!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よっしゃ出撃！　いくぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's sortie! Here we go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの号令に従い、魔人討伐隊は出撃していく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Following Rance's command, the demon extermination squad set out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ようし、私も頑張ろう。いくぞーー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I'll do my best too. Let's go—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、どけこの雑魚が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, get out of the way, you weakling!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃーーーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gyaaaaaaa!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わっと！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目の前で、魔物兵が倒れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In front of me, a monster soldier falls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物スーツ……どうなってるんだろこれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monster suit... I wonder how this works.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も着られないかな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder if I could wear it too...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう帰れお前！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Go home already, you!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐわっ！？　なんじゃこりゃ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gwah!? What the hell is this!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある日。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の廊下一杯に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hallway of Rance Castle was filled with

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネジやゼンマイの山が積み上がっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: piles of screws and springs stacked up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、わあああぁぁ……すごいですね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-whoa... this is amazing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「歩きにくいどころか、進むのが不可能だぞ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not just hard to walk, moving forward is impossible...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええい、邪魔だ、くそ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, you're in the way, damn it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、人類王」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Human King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬっ、ポピンズのメスガキ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nuh, Pappin's brat girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだこれは。お前の仕業か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is this? Is this your doing?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「違いまちゅ！　東芝様でち！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, it's not! It's Lord Toshiba!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……東芝？　何やってんだあいつ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Toshiba? What is he doing?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わたくちと愛の語らいをしている最中に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While I was having a loving talk with him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こう、急に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he suddenly just did this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……どうせ、メカ話でもしてたんだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Probably was talking about machines or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……余計な一言で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Guh... with that unnecessary comment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 甘い記憶を汚さないで欲しいのでち！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to keep that sweet memory unspoiled!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええと、それで急に……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, so suddenly...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしたんですか、このネジ山……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what happened with these piles of screws...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「語らいの中心だった器兵を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He started to disassemble the mecha soldier that was the center of the talk,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その場でバラし始めたのでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: right there on the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……その場で。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...On the spot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでこれ、なんですか……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so this is what happened...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでこれ、なのでち」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, this is the result.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……はた迷惑な生き物だな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Pappins really are bothersome creatures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポピンズってのは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: those Pappins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「東芝様が特殊なだけでち！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Toshiba is just a special case!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とは言っても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That said,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと弄るとかそういうレベルじゃないぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: this isn't just a little tinkering, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道いっぱいに広がっている器兵の残骸は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The remains of the mecha soldiers scattered across the road

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 細部に至るまでバラされており、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were dismantled down to the smallest details,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 原形を留めてはいなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with no original form remaining.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………みつけた、これか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Found it, is this the one?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あったあった、このネジだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here it is, this screw.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ、大きめのひとつを使ったんだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I used a larger one here, but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱり小さいふたつを噛み合わせた方が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: maybe it’s better to mesh two smaller ones together...
